appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: You can easily add slack emoji.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

contextMenuTitleForAddEmojiToNewTeam.description: The title of context menu to add emoji to the new team

contextMenuTitleForAddEmojiToExistingTea.description: The title of context menu to add emoji to the team that already registered

promptTeamName.description: The slack team name of prompt message

promptEmojiName.description: The slack emoji name of prompt message

registrationSuccessTitle.description: The message of registration success notification title

registrationSuccessBody.description: The message of registration success notification

requestLogin.description: The message of request login to slack
